title: South American Indigenous Language Structures (SAILS)
citation: Muysken, Pieter and Harald Hammarström and Olga Krasnoukhova and Neele Müller and Joshua Birchall and Simon van de Kerke and Loretta O'Connor and Swintha Danielsen and Rik van Gijn and George Saad. 2014. South American Indigenous Language Structures (SAILS). Jena: Max Planck Institute for the Science of Human History. (Available at https://sails.clld.org)
